why: GUID bucketed, full rollout features should be on for any GUID
GUID bucketed, full rollout features should fail when no GUID given
ID bucketed, full rollout features should be on for any ID
ID bucketed, full rollout features should be off when no ID given
Fallback bucketed, full rollout features should be on for any ID
Fallback bucketed, full rollout features should be on for any GUID
Fallback bucketed, full rollout features should fail when no ID or GUID given
Single bucketed, full rollout features should be on for any ID or GUID
Single bucketed, zero rollout features should be off for any ID or GUID
Single bucketed, full rollout features should be on when no ID or GUID given
Single bucketed, zero rollout features should be off when no ID or GUID given
